A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really love this movie one of my top 3. The only problem I had was the way they handled Skywalker. I really wanted him to have been involved me. For a guy like me that really loves Star Wars this is really a great and unpredictable movie and I like it. They took risk that ultimately had consequences for many of the viewers that watched this movie. Therefore at the end of the day I would definitely recommend this movie.
